files.patch:
@@ -71,4 +71,12 @@ - * Performs the given action for each remaining element, in the order - * elements occur when iterating, until all elements have been processed - * or the action throws an exception. Errors or runtime exceptions - * thrown by the action are relayed to the caller. + * Performs the given action for each remaining element until all elements + * have been processed or the action throws an exception. Actions are + * performed in the order of iteration, if that order is specified. + * Exceptions thrown by the action are relayed to the caller. + *

+ * The behavior of an iterator is unspecified if the action modifies the + * collection in any way (even by calling the {@link #remove remove} method + * or other mutator methods of {@code Iterator} subtypes), + * unless an overriding class has specified a concurrent modification policy. + *

+ * Subsequent behavior of an iterator is unspecified if the action throws an + * exception. @@ -97,5 +105,1 @@ - * Performs the given action for each remaining element until all elements - * have been processed or the action throws an exception. Actions are - * performed in the order of iteration, if that order is specified. - * Exceptions thrown by the action are relayed to the caller. - * + * {@inheritDoc} @@ -108,3 +112,0 @@ - * - * @param action The action to be performed for each element - * @throws NullPointerException if the specified action is null @@ -171,5 +172,1 @@ - * Performs the given action for each remaining element until all elements - * have been processed or the action throws an exception. Actions are - * performed in the order of iteration, if that order is specified. - * Exceptions thrown by the action are relayed to the caller. - * + * {@inheritDoc} @@ -182,3 +179,0 @@ - * - * @param action The action to be performed for each element - * @throws NullPointerException if the specified action is null @@ -244,5 +238,1 @@ - * Performs the given action for each remaining element until all elements - * have been processed or the action throws an exception. Actions are - * performed in the order of iteration, if that order is specified. - * Exceptions thrown by the action are relayed to the caller. - * + * {@inheritDoc} @@ -255,3 +245,0 @@ - * - * @param action The action to be performed for each element - * @throws NullPointerException if the specified action is null

@@ -303,0 +303,3 @@ + *

+ * Subsequent behavior of a spliterator is unspecified if the action throws + * an exception. @@ -317,0 +320,3 @@ + *

+ * Subsequent behavior of a spliterator is unspecified if the action throws + * an exception. @@ -616,0 +622,3 @@ + *

+ * Subsequent behavior of a spliterator is unspecified if the action throws + * an exception. @@ -631,0 +640,3 @@ + *

+ * Subsequent behavior of a spliterator is unspecified if the action throws + * an exception.
